In the background, the lights of the surrounding city skyline begin to twinkle against the fading light. The camera's fast, continuous movement prevents any single element from remaining static, with the entire scene shifting dynamically from a high-angle, top-down view to a more level, though still elevated, perspective flying through the construction area. A deep focus is used, keeping the entire cityscape sharp.
